key.name: sigma
key.summary: Global sigma (gaussian blur radius) to use

key.name: blur-dash
key.summary: Boolean, whether to blur the dash or not

key.name: blur-panel
key.summary: Boolean, whether to blur the panel or not

key.name: blur-overview
key.summary: Boolean, whether to blur the overview or not

key.name: blur-lockscreen
key.summary: Boolean, whether to blur lockscreen or not

key.name: blur-applications
key.summary: Boolean, whether to blur applications or not

key.name: toggle-app-blur
key.summary: Boolean, whether to show toggle application blur button in panel

key.name: window-class-overrides
key.summary: String, json map for window class blur overrides

key.name: blur-other
key.summary: Boolean, whether to blur things like onscreen keyboard, notifications section, etc.

key.name: hacks-level
key.summary: Level of hacks to use (from 0 to 2)

key.name: static-blur
key.summary: Boolean, whether to have a static blur on panel or a dynamic one
